headline: Stock Market Today, Feb. 11: Ford Rises After 2026 Profit Outlook Offsets Record EV Losses
summary: Record revenue, deep EV losses, and a sharp pivot toward hybrids are reshaping this automaker's profit story, today, Feb. 11, 2026.

summary: General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) is among the 12 Best Autonomous Driving Stocks to Buy Right Now. headline: Toyota recasts Highlander as 3-row electric SUV, even as industry reverses from EVs
summary: Toyota reintroduced its once-popular Highlander three-row SUV as a full EV with improved capabilities, just as the industry pushes away from costly battery electrics.

raw.headline: Toyota recasts Highlander as 3-row electric SUV, even as industry reverses from EVs
raw.summary: Toyota reintroduced its once-popular Highlander three-row SUV as a full EV with improved capabilities, just as the industry pushes away from costly battery electrics.

headline: Ford Q4 results hit by tariffs and EV losses, but investors focus on improved outlook
summary: Ford reported fourth quarter results Tuesday after the bell that missed expectations, with charges stemming from its EV business and warranties resulting in a net loss for quarter and the year.

raw.headline: Ford Q4 results hit by tariffs and EV losses, but investors focus on improved outlook

headline: Odds Trump Is Forced To Refund Tariffs Drop Sharply As Supreme Court Justice Warns Of Legal Complexity
summary: Jackson pours cold water on hopes for court to force Trump to refund tariffs, suggests ruling could take time due to constitutional complexity.

headline: Does it Make Sense to Own Ford Stock After Dismal Q4 Results?
summary: F posted a $11.1B Q4 loss as EV reset charges and tariffs hurt, but a stronger 2026 outlook and Ford Pro & Blue growth hint at recovery ahead.

raw.headline: Does it Make Sense to Own Ford Stock After Dismal Q4 Results?
raw.summary: F posted a $11.1B Q4 loss as EV reset charges and tariffs hurt, but a stronger 2026 outlook and Ford Pro & Blue growth hint at recovery ahead.

headline: US automakers’ EV challenges are hardly surprising, says one industry watcher
summary: Curt Hopkins, CEO of a platform for investing in collector cars, said global differences in consumer demand, technology stacks and driving preferences all contributed to the industry’s woes.

headline: What Catalysts Are Shifting The Story For Gladstone Commercial (GOOD) Now
summary: Gladstone Commercial’s latest update keeps its model fair value anchored at about US$12.50 per share, but the story behind that number is shifting as analysts focus more on upcoming lease expirations. The discount rate and revenue growth assumptions move only slightly, and most of the attention now sits on how the General Motors office lease in Austin and the defined 2026 rollover window could shape market confidence in the years around 2027. Stay tuned to see how you can track these evolving...
